summary: I wanted to use Derkeethus as a follower and a marriage partner -- unfortunately, he is quite possibly the most BORING argonian to grace Skyrim.  Well, not anymore!  (I hope.)
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to use Derkeethus as a follower and a marriage partner -- unfortunately, he is quite possibly the most BORING argonian to grace Skyrim.  

So, I jumped into the Creation Kit and made him prettier, or at least, prettier according to my female argonian, Tar-Ja.

This was tested with over 50 hours of gameplay and should be compatible with UFO (I had it last in my load order).  

This is my first mod in a very long time, and as simple as it is, I hope I packaged it correctly to prevent the dark face bug.  Please report any issues, upload pictures, or endorse if you found this file to be to your liking.
author: American Jackal
